entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Moosonee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:22 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -25.6°C

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 23. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of snow this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 45 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
